H0.text: Calvados apple brandy is traditionally produced in which country. Italy

H1.text: Calvados apple brandy is traditionally produced in which country. United States

H2.text: Calvados apple brandy is traditionally produced in which country. Germany

H3.text: Calvados apple brandy is traditionally produced in which country. FRANCE

A4.text: Calvados is a brandy from Normandy in France, made from apples and/or pears.

A5.text: Like many French wines, calvados is governed by appellation contrôlée regulations.
